title.narrative: Supporting an Inter-faith Platform for Peace

description.narrative: The main element of the intervention is to consolidate the existence of an inter-faith platform on peace in Burundi. This platform should represent all the major faiths. It will operate on the national level, with some activities done in Bujumbura mayoralty to connect the national forum with the grassroots (this may be expanded beyond Bujumbura if further funding is won).

The project will hire a Coordinator for CICB to establish regular protocols, establish a CICB conflict analysis system to regularly update on the national situation, arrange an exchange visit, meet with national level government to explain the role of the Platform, meet with major national media organs on possible collaborations with the Platform. rain eight communal dialogue facilitators from Bujumbura Mayoralty. Once Bujumbura-based representatives of the platform are identified, these dialogue facilitators will start training them on the same skills. The coordinator and some CICB representatives will meet with local Government officials in Bujumbura Mayoralty to explain role of interfaith platform and the need for this forum to operate. CICB will sensitize the Bujumbura Mayoralty communities on the planned platform establishment. CICB will select individuals to represent the communities in the platform according to open criteria.
